segments.text: I observe the angled view of the kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink area is on the right, with cabinets opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's facing away, handling a plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is filling and spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in it, but she continues undeterred.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the upper cabinets are ajar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar sits inside, invitingly full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a step stool, reaching in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts, which catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm extended toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're coordinating quietly, away from the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic scene of unnoticed childhood antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll catch them in time.
segments.speaker: PAR
